products.title: Vitra Blackout Sunburst Yellow Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Vitra blackout sunburst yellow roller blind in yellow. Made to measure from 8.77 with free uk mainland delivery. This roller blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Their vitra blackout sunburst yellow fabric is a stunning, bright but subtle shade of yellow, perfect to add a bright pop of colour into your interiors. This shade will work beautifuly as an accent with chic grey shades but will also compliment natural wooden tones. A real all rounder.Blackout fabrics will completely block light from coming through making them a perfect addition for bedrooms and any room that requires maximum light control. The quality of this fabric range is second to none and will provide a high quality finish to your interior style.
 
 Product id: sdb-rbx2147 fabric colour: sunburst yellow material: 100% polyester lining: colour match backing - see sample headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix   control type: smooth continuous-looped chain energy saving rating: er3 - highest energy saving value - uv protection and effective thermal retention blackout: yes
